data.title: NetSuite ERP Glendale, CA
data.meta_description: Information Integration Group is the premier NetSuite ERP provider serving all of Glendale, CA
data.text:
NetSuite ERP Consultant, Glendale, CA

NetSuite ERP Consultant Glendale, CA - Information Integration Group, Inc.

Headquartered in southern California, Information Integration Group, Inc. (IIG) is a systems integrator, master developer, and leading provider of business management software solutions throughout North America. As a channel partner of NetSuite Inc., IIG is adept at implementing NetSuiteâ€™s cloud-based and fully integrated system for SMEs spanning various vertical markets.

For more than 22 years, IIG has tailored information technology systems to our valued clients' needs. Finding the right solution is a collaborative process and understanding the business environment is the key to making smart technology choices. To make the right choice, we work closely with our customers to learn about their business and software requirements, in order to develop solutions that best serve their overall financial and technological goals.

IIG's expert team of consultants and programmers is dedicated to helping clients achieve critical business insights for bottom-line decision making through a full range of easy-to-use, scalable and customizable applications.

In addition, IIG has an established track record in implementing systems for a number of industries via a variety of platforms. Our clients operate systems ranging from 5 users at a single location to 250 users at seven locations. We offer professional services, including EDI, e-commerce, and network services, in addition to customized solutions for clients in need of additional functionality and features.

Headquarters:

457 Palm Drive

Glendale, CA 91202
